item.title: America’s landlords settle claim they used rent-setting algorithms to gouge consumers nationwide for $141 million
item.description: Greystar, the nation's largest landlord, would pay $50 million under the proposed settlement agreement, with 25 others also settling.

item.title: Meet the only campus protester still locked up by Trump, a 32-year-old Palestinian who grew up in the West Bank with aunts and uncles in Gaza
item.description: “Most days I feel helpless,” says Leqaa Kordia, the New Jersey resident who has been jailed since March in a Texas immigration detention center.

item.title: Lawsuit: Tesla design trapped a college student inside as it burst into flames
item.description: Krysta Tsukahara was in the back of a Cybertruck when the driver who was drunk and had taken drugs smashed into a tree, according to the suit.

item.title: Scientists say eating a plant-based diet could save 15 million deaths and save the environment
item.description: The first EAT-Lancet report proposed a “planetary health diet” centered on grains, fruits, vegetables, nuts and legumes.

item.title: ‘We are going to destroy jobs faster than we can replace them’: The CEO whose 80% stock plunge personified the dotcom bubble on AI’s impact
item.description: "There are a lot of parallels but there are also some spectacular differences," says former Cisco CEO John Chambers, adding that AI is moving at 5x th...
